WorkItem.Description:
Rawr Version: 2.2.9
 
There is still in issue with Elemental shaman and haste effacts.
 
Reducing Haste value to zero - and removing all Haste/speed effects will display casting time on Lightning Bolt as 2sec - which is correct. (with the appropriate Talents)
 
Adding any Haste Values - by any type of gear - result in an increase of the Cast time, which cause a decrease in the DPS value.
 
Simply put - it seems all haste values still calculated as nagtive values
